titleStmt.title: The one necessary thing to be sought briefly touched in a four-fold dialogue upon some of the great and most concerning truths of practical religion.
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694.

titleStmt.title: The one necessary thing to be sought briefly touched in a four-fold dialogue upon some of the great and most concerning truths of practical religion.
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694.

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes this work to Robert Fleming the younger, however NUC pre-1956 imprints attributes it to the elder Fleming.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
